Its well known and long-established that walnuts can help improve heart health. 
Walnuts contain alpha-Linolenic acid (ALA), an essential omega-3 fatty acid that helps keep the heart pumping normall… [+3852 chars]

articles.author: Beth Skwarecki
articles.title: Why Your Back Hurts, and What You Can Do About It - Lifehacker
articles.description: Most of the time there isn't an obvious cause for back pain. Strengthening can help.
articles.content: Saying my back hurts is a bit like saying my car is making a noise. It may be serious, or it may be nothing, and only a professional will know for sure. But if you have back pain, especially in your … [+4976 chars]
